title.narrative: Single Parent Female-Headed Households: Support for Single Mothers in Arkhangai Aimag Mongolia

description.narrative: DEVELOPMENT OBJECTIVE: Increased participation of single mothers in the labor market through gaining employment and societal support. PROJECT OBJECTIVE/ PURPOSE: The educational and employment rights of single mothers in Arkhangai Province are strengthened This project to aims to specifically help vulnerable single mothers through activities that aim to improve their economic status to help them gain financial independence. We also work with married couples and teenage girls on themes such as family planning preventing divorce reproductive rights and peer pressure.MAIN BENEFICIARIES: single mothers young adolescent girls ( aged 13+) and married couples.MAIN ACTIVITIES: -Trainings to help women get employment through work preparedness and vocational training a nd promotion of apprenticeships -Raising awareness of the state support to which single mothers are entitl-Societal Awareness and advocacy concerning the rights of single mothers -Peer group support and counseling for single mothers, -The formation of a ne w NGO dedicated to promoting single mothers' rights. This gives single mothers an important forum for expressing their views and communicating with local authorities-- Counselling for women married couples and teenage girls The project will be covered by l ocal television and news media and the project with also produce information material such as brochures outlining the project and its aims.
